name: storybox
description: Storybox is a UI development environment for your React components based on React Storybook package includes popular addons and best decorators.
author: Igor Suvorov <hi@isuvorov.ru>

scripts.release: DEBUG=0 npm run babel-build && npm publish dist
scripts.babel-build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp {package.json,yarn.lock,README.md} dist/ && babel src --out-dir dist --source-maps inline --copy-files
scripts.babel-build-2: mkdir dist && cp {package.json,yarn.lock,README.md} dist/ && babel src --out-dir dist --source-maps inline --copy-files
